```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```


```{r}
data("instacart")

ic_df = 
  instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
ic_df %>% 
  mutate(aisle = fct_reorder(aisle, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~n, type = "scatter", color = ~aisle) %>% 
  layout(title = 'Number of items ordered in each aisle',
         xaxis = list(title = 'Aisle'),
         yaxis = list(title = '# of items ordered'))


```
